column4: TOP STORIES;BREAKING NEWS: An American male
column6: has thrown himself from the third floor at the Amari Hotel on Street 136. Psar Kandal
column9: 2019 at 3.30pm. The man appears to have landed on a Highlander car
column10: and died instantly. The deceased has  been identified as Matthew Steven Simonsen
column11: a U.S. national. There are conflicting reports that say that he was 53 or 56 years old.
